title: Delay Block
description: This function block implements a four-times delayed output based on the input signal. The input value is passed through a series of outputs, delaying the signal progressively, which allows for smoothing effects in signal processing.
name: DELAY_4

input.name: in
input.description: The input signal to be delayed.

output.name: out1
output.description: The first delayed output of the input signal.

output.name: out2
output.description: The second delayed output of the input signal.

output.name: out3
output.description: The third delayed output of the input signal.

output.name: out4
output.description: The fourth delayed output of the input signal.
